column1: Smoque BBQ////The restaurant is fairly clean
column2: with 2 bussers just waiting for you to take your last bite so they can snatch your tray. There were also other randomly scattered employees who have clearly mastered their trade
column3: but appeared none-too-happy to be working there. I caught a couple of random scowls. Maybe it's because I was dressed like a total d-bag? I rocked the untucked Polo shirt
column5: and flip flops getup today. I might as well have had "How do I get back to Wrigleyville?" tattooed on my forehead.
